items.headline: Two of Wall Street’s last holdouts finally concede the Fed will cut next month
items.summary_en: Two of the last few remaining Wall Street holdouts on the Fed easing next month have finally conceded defeat and now expect the central bank to reduce interest rates at its next meeting.

items.headline: Billions wiped off value of French banks with Bayrou-led government on verge of collapse
items.summary_en: French banking giants BNP Paribas and Societe Generale saw billions of euros wiped off their market value on Tuesday as the government of the eurozone’s number-two economy was set for collapse.
